attributes.action: Don't ban disposable vapes in the uk
attributes.additional_details: Keep vapes in the uk just regulate them more
attributes.background: Noone has voted for a PM since borris left now rishi wants to take action in everything he's already messed with the economy now wants to ban vapes. CRAZY

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Don't ban disposable vapes
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654417
